alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and southwestern Franklin Counties through 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/... At 1020 PM EDT/920 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Port St. Joe, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Eastpoint, Franklin, Nine Mile, Bay City, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Apalachicola Airport, Odena and Tilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
